TopicTitle: Spoilers do not Open -- Mozilla Firefox

Articles.Content:
Strange bug, I can still create a spoiler:

Can't see this

But I cannot "open" it.
Working here, are you using any blocking plugins? I had a similar issue ages ago that was caused by privacybadger.

Oh, I wouldn't doubt it. My father is into all kinds of security wizardry.

Bah, this is why I use my laptop or tablet. Dumb desktop.
It's just BB code to a bit of java, are either of these switched off for you in the browser?

Can't tell, don't know how to use Firefox...

Well, there are some checkboxes, that say "Enable Java/Javascript", but they were on.

It is probably not the most recent version of Java or Firefox, and this is a Windows Vista operating system.
Maybe there's a standalone version of your preferred browser that does not need installing, I'm assuming you can't install stuff on this machine.

Oh, it's no trouble, I was just checking to see if it was a bug.

I can install stuff here, but there's not much point.
